cd909561-ea3f-40b1-a32a-1e2cb13edd57.name: 战斗反射
cd909561-ea3f-40b1-a32a-1e2cb13edd57.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

51b26887-2684-404d-b557-a644ba4b382d.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

9f349d39-963b-49e2-9a95-5e8660280598.name: 幸运

563bb76b-d160-40df-9b54-57809e39f961.name: Luck, Extraordinary
563bb76b-d160-40df-9b54-57809e39f961.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

3226af74-8410-4e98-9633-c303883fbfee.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

e2637e11-d78c-41c8-ba6e-193cd995868b.name: Reaction Bonus
e2637e11-d78c-41c8-ba6e-193cd995868b.notes: Con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

d9e248e2-5e5a-470b-8b3f-e9165ebc4140.name: 可选增益
d9e248e2-5e5a-470b-8b3f-e9165ebc4140.notes: 在抵抗天赋对应的技能上获得加值

537e0196-bbc5-4c45-8c60-fe3a280f4251.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

225a9b26-3764-4a0a-a0f1-43734ae83a63.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

457ebe2c-0dda-4fc3-ad87-18ea162d5917.name: 期待陪伴
457ebe2c-0dda-4fc3-ad87-18ea162d5917.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

3cb88ad3-6909-41f5-9fd6-b7c596c032df.notes: Become the Best Swordsman in the World

297f2ca9-cc6f-4e21-a3de-8fb6d8d6309b.name: OR 2 points to raise one of those skills or any two two-point primary or secondary skill by a level

2ace4b5c-d3e2-4e77-917e-8e19cb8b2d58.name: 1 point to raise skill by a level or 1 point ro acquire another secondary skill at one level lower
